title: Plat 1 Support Looking for serious ranked 5s team
body: I'm looking for a serious ranked team that are committed to playing on a regular basis and won't give up. I am a very decent support and am willing to work as a team to get better as well. I'm adaptable and ready for challenges. I'm open to criticism and tips as well as giving tips to other people. I don't flame teams in ranked 5s and I am a very good communicator. Looking for a decent team to take me under their wings and teach me the ways. :)
